I got some weird problem, but i suspect itd because of me.
When i use the launcher for 64bits Windows 7 but when i start the screen is all black exept the text that says Minecraft.
I press start and it loads for a few secons then gets a error.
What am i doing wrong?
I did put the game in C:\Users\Your User Name\Appdata\Roaming\.minecraft
Please help!
whats the error?
"Outdated launcher!"

"Outdated Launcher"
FIX IT!!!

There is nothing wrong with the launcher.

Learn to READ!

=======================================================

Upgrading?

(Many things have changed, I *HIGHLY RECOMMEND* deleting your old
.minecraft folder and unpacking this fresh.)

But if you wish to do a normal upgrade.
Replace your MineCraft folder in ".minecraft" with this one.
Overwrite all files. Start MineCraft by running Launch.bat or Launch_x64.bat
Enjoy!


=======================================================

Install Instructions:

UNPACK your RAR into %appdata% folder.

This is how your folder should look like after it's unpacked
Make Sure you change "Your User Name" with your actual username

Windows 7: 
C:\Users\Your User Name\Appdata\Roaming\.minecraft

Windows Vista: 
C:\Users\Your User Name\Appdata\Roaming\.minecraft

Windows XP: 
C:\Documents and Settings\Your User Name\Local Settings\Application Data\.minecraft


That's ALL now Run "Launch.bat" or "Launch_x64.bat" to play!
If you have Win7 and 64bit Java with 4GB or more RAM you can run "Launch_x64_4GB.bat" (5GB or more required)

one last question... does kaen have a website that is working? if so what is it, and is he even still working on updates for this or did he stop? i want to be able to watch and monitor and make sure that i have the most current version available so that i can mess around with all of the features...  thank you everyone for anyone that may be able to shed some light on these issues..

ok, for those of you having this problem -->

'i have installed the folder into the correct directory, but when i launch the .bat file, i see q black window for a split second before it disappears, and the game will not launch'

the solution i found was simple, and that solution is to go download the latest Java Release for free. i had the problem, thats what i did, and now it runs fine, as advertised. 

Great upload!

"muellertr"- This is an earlier version, so it have no dyes at all. Also, it has no squids, no note blocks, no dispenser, no charcoal... et.c.

Here's the full list of what it don't have: http://www.minecraftwiki.net/wiki/Version_history
This version is Alpha 1.2.6
